mapper.select: SELECT ssa.id as ssaId , ssav.id as ssavId , ssa.sale_attr_id,ssa.sale_attr_name,ssav.id,ssav.sale_attr_value_name,ssav2.sku_id, if(ssav2.sku_id is not null,1,0) as isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr ssa inner JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssa.sale_attr_id = ssav.sale_attr_id AND ssa.spu_id=ssav.spu_id and ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value ssav2 ON ssav2.sale_attr_id = ssa.sale_attr_id AND ssav2.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id AND ssav2.sku_id = #{skuId}
select ssav.id as ssavId, info.id,ssav.sale_attr_value_id from sku_info info,sku_sale_attr_value ssav WHERE ssav.sku_id = info.id AND info.spu_id = #{spuId}
